title: Zvartnots Cathedral
description: A seventh century AD church built by Catholicos Nerses the Builder (AD 641-653) and located in the Armavir Province of Armenia. The ruins of the church were listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2000.

properties.description: Coordinates after Wikipedia; verified in Google Earth 2012. Dates after UNESCO WHL.
properties.title: location of Zvartnots Cathedral
